name: survive if you can
description:
This is a test project. I can not go on because I still have to learn unity. It should become a survival game with animals that can kill you. I would like your opinion on this game. At the moment you can only run around on the map. It still lacks a craft menu and an inventory menu. does anyone know how to program this? It should also come to a construction menu. At the day / night change, I'm already working and it will come soon for an update.
I'm working on this game by myself and that's not easy. Unity 3d is English, and my English is not good. That's why it's hard for me to develop this game.
Greetings from Germany
